<<<<<<< HEAD
Yet more vvorke for a Masse-priest More worke for a Masse-priest Cooke, Alexander, 1564-1632. Cooke, Alexander, 1564-1632. Worke for a Masse-priest.
[4], 42, [2] p.
Printed by William Iones, and are to be sold by William Sheffard at his shop in Popes head Ally, London : 1622.
Dedication signed: Alexander Cooke. A revision of "More worke for a Masse-priest", in turn a much-expanded version of "Worke for a Masse-priest". The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
=======

[4], 42, [2] p.
Printed by William Iones, and are to be sold by William Sheffard at his shop in Popes head Ally, London : 1622.
Dedication signed: Alexander Cooke. A revision of "More worke for a Masse-priest", in turn a much-expanded version of "Worke for a Masse-priest". The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
